00017 // GetTemplate()
00018 // -- gets a template from the template file
00019 const TTemplate* TemplateArchive::GetTemplate(const char* template_name) {
00020 
00021   TTemplate* hTemplate = NULL;
00022   fDirectory->GetObject(template_name, hTemplate);
00023   return hTemplate;
00024 }

00026 // SaveTemplate()
00027 // -- saves a template to the template file
00028 void TemplateArchive::SaveTemplate(const TTemplate* hTemplate) {
00029 
00030   TDirectory* oldDir = TDirectory::CurrentDirectory(); // should be the directory we were already in
00031   if (hTemplate) {
00032     fDirectory->cd();
00033     hTemplate->Write();
00034   }
00035   oldDir->cd(); // go back to the old directory
00036 }
